name: Sheep in Touch (CholfyJams, CyclopicSpider, MikeAlan9051, swagshaw)
name_original: Sheep in Touch (CholfyJams, CyclopicSpider, MikeAlan9051, swagshaw)
description:
Round up 'em sheep to the barn! It's easy to miss some with the sheep sticking together. Just mind the wolves 'n twisters.

Rotational directional controls using WASD, Controller Axis, or Arrow Keys.


Easter Egg: Don't let the chicken out!

Made for Curdle Jam 18!

Teams:
Cholfy - Unity Expert and Shader Wizard
Mike Alan - Lead/Environmental Pixel Artist
CyclopicSpider - 3D Artist and Sound Design
Swagshaw - Resident Swag and 2.5D Pixel Animations

Additional Credits:
SpriteStack - 3D to Pixel Rendering
Dan - Free Leaderboard Plug-in
Font - "Appo Paint"
Chrome Music Lab - Music
